questions:
What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A bird
C) A person
D) A car

Where was the photo taken?
A) In a forest
B) On a wooden deck
C) On a beach
D) Inside a house

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A bird flying
B) A bird resting on the ground
C) A bird perched on a branch
D) A bird in a nest

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A bird
C) A person
D) A lamp post

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A forest
B) A wooden fence
C) A mountain range
D) A cityscape

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) Grass
B) A bird
C) Water
D) Sand

What type of bird is in the photo?
A) A duck
B) A hawk
C) A pigeon
D) A sparrow

What is the bird doing in the photo?
A) Flying
B) Eating
C) Resting with wings spread
D) Singing

What kind of surface is the bird resting on?
A) Grass
B) Sand
C) Wooden planks
D) Concrete

A) Another bird
B) A Pole
C) A tree
D) A person

A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Wooden
D) Metallic

A) Standing upright
B) Lying on its side
C) Spreading its wings on the ground
D) Perched on a branch

What is the color of the bird's feathers?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Black and white
D) Green

What is the material of the fence in the background?
A) Metal
B) Wood
C) Plastic
D) Stone

A) New and polished
B) Old and worn
C) Wet and slippery
D) Covered in leaves

A) Stripes
B) Spots
C) Plain
D) Zigzag

What is the bird's body orientation?
A) Facing the camera
B) Facing away from the camera
C) Side profile
D) Upside down

What is the lighting condition in the photo?
A) Bright sunlight
B) Overcast
C) Nighttime
D) Indoor lighting

What is the primary color of the surface the bird is on?
A) Green
B) Beige/ grey
C) Grey
D) White

What is the bird's wing position?
A) Closed
B) Partially open
C) Spread 
D) Broken

B) Round
C) Triangular
D) Hexagonal

C) Sideways
D) Curled

B) Low
C) Moderate

C) Low angle
D) High angle

A) Camouflage
B) Attraction
C) Warning
D) Health

B) Light brownish grey

D) White

A) Red
B) Blue
C) Black
D) Brown

What is the bird's overall appearance?

D) Disheveled
